title: Apart
summary: When a pair of star-crossed lovers are forced apart by fate it's up to them to right the future. As they fall deeper in love, they experience visions of a deadly future - those around them are doomed to die. Within days their premonitions become reality as their friends start dying around them. As the visions intensify, it becomes clear that the next people to die will be them. The couple has to choose between remaining together and hurting those around them, or staying apart forever.
